page.title: 07INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The biggest area of industry,big and small is concentrated around the bypass in North Walsham. There are many sorts of firms there- Hamilton Bros.control the flow of gas and oil from the Bacton Terminal and rigs in the North Sea. East Coast Plastics make baby goods and stationary.They have 200workers,customers all over the U.K. They have been here about 4years. Dairy Crest-milk comes here in bottles from Norwich and is put on the milk floats and delivered to peoples doorsteps in and around North Walsham. There are some engieering firms. there are 2 agricultural engineering firms which mend and sell tractors and farm things.RICHES(Massey Ferguson)and NORTH WALSHAM TRACTORS(FIAT) The Norfolk College of Agriculture has a unit here -A.T.B.
